snippet.title: Sector One | A VR journey through space & time
snippet.description:
Sector One takes you on a virtual journey through 10 different worlds, where your goal is to fly your spaceship as long as you can, while neutralizing enemies, manipulating the flow of time, and overcoming obstacles.

Each world offers a unique visual experience but also comes with different kinds of challenges that you need to overcome.

Our goal is to make players immerse themselves in artful worlds where their reflexes are being tested at every moment.

The visual effects and audio effects are designed to give you a surreal experience that you will enjoy and love.

Killing enemies and lasting longer will help you earn trophies, and the more trophies you have, the higher you are on the leaderboard of players worldwide.

________________________________________________
Coming soon on Oculus Store & Steam.
_________________________________________________

SOCIAL MEDIA:

WEBSITE: https://www.playalley.net/

INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/playalleyvr/

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/playalleyVR

________________________________________________

Get your custom Playalley avatar here:
https://playalley.readyplayer.me/

Thanks for watching!!!
